cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 1385 miles ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing rapidly westward and then west-northwestward toward the Lesser Antilles, with dissipation expected east of the islands over the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Not expected to make landfall (forecast to dissipate before reaching land)

weather_observation.watch_coast: No coastal watches in effect anywhere in the basin
weather_observation.warning_coast: No coastal warnings in effect anywhere in the basin
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Expected to pass well south of the Lesser Antilles; no direct impact to Puerto Rico
